Key Match Events: Juan Soto doubled in the automatic runner in the bottom of the 10th inning to win the game for the Yankees.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Alex Cora said, 'It's been going on for a while now, we haven't hit.' He also mentioned that the team is going through a funk and that they have shown the ability to hit before.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox fell 2-1 to the Yankees as they struggled to score runs, going 0-for-11 with runners in scoring position and leaving seven men on base.
Others: Cooper Criswell lowered Red Sox starters' ERA to 2.43 over their last 17 games with a strong start, allowing one run on four hits and three walks while striking out four over 5 1/3 innings.
